data.title: Ittihad signs a contract with Houssem Aouar for 4 seasons
data.meta_description: Al-Ittihad Club announced its official contract with Algerian Houssem Aouar
data.text:
Al-Ittihad Club announced its official contract with Algerian Houssem Aouar, coming from Rome, with a contract extending for the next 4 seasons, that is, until the summer of 2028.

Al-Ittihad Club indicated via An official statement, this Wednesday morning, indicated that the signing ceremony with Houssem Aouar took place at the headquarters of the first football team’s camp in the Spanish city of Alicante, after the player passed the medical examination.

Domingues Oliveira, CEO of Al-Ittihad Club, welcomed the Algerian player Houssem Aouar, hoping that his move to the captain will be a distinguished milestone in his career and contribute to providing levels and results that meet the aspirations of the club and its fans.

Domingos explained that the contract with Houssem Aouar came based on the team’s technical needs for a player who possesses technical specifications that serve the system, which is the basis that was established in the contracts.
